about_the_game:
The Battle of the Red, White and Blue… the second content pack from the 2024 season is ready to join the grid in Le Mans Ultimate. The Texan shootout at the Circuit of Americas hosts the battleground between the French flair of Alpine and the independent adventures of Isotta Fraschini.

The spirit of Le Mans goes stateside, with the arrival of the Circuit of the Americas to Le Mans Ultimate. COTA returned to the FIA World Endurance Championship calendar in 2024 and creates its own unique challenges to sports car racing. From the dry desert heat, to its carefully considered circuit composition – offering plenty of variety in a single lap. From the fast and flowing, high-speed opening half to the tight and twisty end of the lap.

The Alpine A424, from the French sports car manufacturer – conjures up the magic and mystique of sports car racing from yesteryear. It’s angular, purposeful looks, complete with vibrant Mecachrome 3.4-litre V6 engine note makes the A424 stand out on the FIA WEC grid. A new car to the 2024 season, the pace and momentum of the Alpine has been building with every round. Can you get them over the line and claim that first podium for ‘le bleu’?

The Tipo 6 Competizione from boutique Italian manufacturer Isotta Fraschini completes the 2024 FIA WEC Hypercar grid in Le Mans Ultimate. The car may be an underdog in a fiercely competitive prototype field… however, the Isotta is not a team wanting to make up the numbers. Continue the legacy for the indie marque and take the fight to the establishment behind the wheel of the Tipo 6 Competizione.

Content included (expected release 24th September)
• Circuit of the Americas (COTA)
• Alpine A424 Hypercar
• Isotta Fraschini Tipo 6 Competizione Hypercar

name: Le Mans Ultimate - 2024 Pack 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 950 (4GB) or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: To run on minimal settings at 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Battle of the Red, White and Blue… the second content pack from the 2024 season is ready to join the grid in Le Mans Ultimate. The Texan shootout at the Circuit of Americas hosts the battleground between the French flair of Alpine and the independent adventures of Isotta Fraschini.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
